description.translate: At the edge of the point, you could not aspire to less lethality.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Sommité\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7A l'orée de la pointe, tu ne saurais\"}","{\"text\":\"§7apsirer à moins de létalité.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7At the edge of the point, you could\"}","{\"text\":\"§7not aspire to less lethality.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7HUN§a2 §7DAR§c-1\"}"]}}
